definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: All rights to the Olympic symbol belong exclusively to the IOC.
sentences.chinese: 奥林匹克标志的所有权属国际奥委会专有。

sentences.english: Afore-mentioned concessionary products can use number of international Olympic committee.
sentences.chinese: 上述特许产品可以使用国际奥委会标记。

sentences.english: Through television, the IOC makes most of its money by selling rights to broadcast the games.
sentences.chinese: 国际奥委会的大部分收入来自于赛事的电视转播费。

sentences.english: Since what time has Juan Antonio Samaranch been the president of the International Olympic Committee?
sentences.chinese: 萨马蓝奇从什么时辰开始成为国际奥委会主席的？

sentences.english: The IOC minimum requirement for a gold medal is 6g of the pure yellow metal.
sentences.chinese: 国际奥委会对金牌的要求是至少要有6克的金。

sentences.english: The IOC President appealed to the athletes to play their part as role models.
sentences.chinese: 国际奥委会主席呼吁运动员要争当典范楷模。

sentences.english: Standing on the White House lawn, he delivered a message to the I. O. C.
sentences.chinese: 站在白空的草坪上，他向国际奥委会转达了信息。

sentences.english: He retired as the second-longest serving president in the history of the IOC.
sentences.chinese: 他是国际奥委会历史上任期第二长的主席。

sentences.english: Prefaced by the President of the International Olympic Committee Samaranch.
sentences.chinese: 本书由国际奥委会主席萨马兰奇作序。

sentences.english: The appointment of Deng Yaping as member of the International Olympic Committee excited us.
sentences.chinese: 邓亚萍被任命为国际奥委会委员，这使我们愉快不已。

sentences.english: Okay, so maybe the IOC picked the wrong rule again.
sentences.chinese: 那么，也许是国际奥委会有一次选错了规则。

sentences.english: The Chinese government respects and appreciates the conclusion reached by the IOC Evaluation Commission.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府尊重并赞赏国际奥委会评估团所做的结论。

sentences.english: For its part, the IOC has learned how scorpions behave.
sentences.chinese: 国际奥委会可是领教过蝎子是如何表现的。

definition: Olympic organizing committee/abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會組織委員會|奥林匹克运动会组织委员会
Pingchang county in Panzhihua 攀枝花[Pan1 zhi1 hua1], south Sichuan

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF)/abbr. for 國際田徑聯合會|国际田径联合会[Guo2 ji4 Tian2 jing4 Lian2 he2 hui4]
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
Sochi (city on the Black Sea in Russia)
organizational committee/abbr. for 組織委員會|组织委员会
abbr. for 國際足球聯合會|国际足球联合会, FIFA, international federation of football associations
Medvedyev (name)/Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008
